Title: Requires patient transporters to meet certain minimum requirements
Summary: Requires patient transporters to complete a state accredited basic life support course, in which knowledge and skills in cardiopulmonary resuscitation using automated external defibrillators and relieving airway obstructions is taught.
LawCode: Add ยง2830, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring patient transporters to meet certain minimum requirements
